Reviews.Title: “Good Value for money”

Reviews.Content: condal typical okay hotel clean heart la ramblas noisy saturday nights hear shouting bars outside hotel receptionist unfriendly spoke little english value money basically pay maybe tiny little

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”

Reviews.Content: stayed 2010 2 nights hotel loved price clean bathroom smell front street windows closed somehow additional shutters malfunctioned yes told pushed hand besides beat location price dont bcn noisy city dare stay twice future

Reviews.Title: “Excellent for what we needed”
Reviews.Author: travellingvoyageur
Reviews.Content: friend stayed hotel weeks holiday barcelona september 2010 21 holiday consisted daytime sightseeing nighttime partying hotel absolutely fantastic perfectly located centre barcelona literally 2min walk busy metro stop coming home taxi time wasnt expensive thanks location hotel perfectly clean tidy bath safe tv basically youre reason hotel sleeping free wifi proved helpful checking details cultural activities etc service desk pretty helpful people encountered 2 fantastic moody helpful questions family enjoys luxury staying hotel lot maybe look options looking clean simple easily accessed stay definitely recommend

Reviews.Content: picked hotel read reviews extensively hence noisy night prime location middle la rambla 100m liceu metro station green line direct line visit reception friendly helpful fluent english whoever manning desk left luggage secured dining seen guess eateries yards la boqueria market daily rations fruits juices breakfast express nearby crossaints thats breakfast sorted air con dont deliberate octoberwe patio doors cool air door led narrow balcony feel safe 5 floors worried thieves climbing height cleanliness perfect mattress shower fine tv crt 2 english news channels hotels english channels reason picked hotel free wifi tested speed hovers ps sometimes slow disconnect reconnect wifi continue surfing functional safety issue kid ok prostitutes hanging la rambla corner midnight bothered kids past 10pm shops start closing streets ramblas bit deserted definitely return realistic expectations met
